statements: DELETE FROM historical_sales_data WHERE customer_id = 100 AND sale_date = '2022-01-10';
DELETE FROM historical_sales_data WHERE customer_id = 500 AND sale_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND revenue > 1000;
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 5000 AND sale_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 500
DELETE FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA' AND city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM SalesTeams WHERE team_location = 'New York' AND team_size < 10;
